levels.title: Level 1 – Letters and Symbols
levels.description: Learn the Paleo-Hebrew alphabet, symbols, and core meanings.

levels.title: Level 2 – Roots and Word Building
levels.description: Discover how letters combine into roots with layered meanings.

levels.title: Level 3 – Scripture and Interpretation
levels.description: Apply Paleo-Hebrew concepts to biblical words and key passages.
